description: Easy to use. And its free.

works exactly like I wanted. super easy to use and of course it's free 

tried it on xiomi mi 9, (android pie)

Took a little while for me to get set up (adb not detecting my device). But it worked as soon as I figured it out.

In case anyone runs into some issues, heres what I did:
1) Enable USB Debugging on your device
2) Connect your device to your computer with a USB
3) Disable MTP and enable PTP on your device
4) Restart adb server `adb kill-server`, `adb start-server`
5) Start scrcpy

Great software that lets me watch streaming services that don't support Linux by playing them on my android phone instead.

However there are a few troubleshooting issues. I followed what Tyler's review below says (Enable USB debugging, change mobile to PTP mode, then stop and restart the adb server on Ubuntu).

You may also have to install adb on Ubuntu first. I also find that I need to run scrcpy once (and let it fail) before restarting the server. 

I had additional issues with a sound lag, and low resolution (I have a cheap phone and an old computer). After digging around I found I can avoid these issues by calling the command this way:

	$ scrcpy -m640 

Then it works fine! Hope this is useful!
summary: Great but takes a little effort to set up

description: Android mirrored and no insideous charges or sneaky servers!

I am an Android/IOS developer also a native android root level developer. But my PC is too bad for running apps on Windows/Ubuntu & sometimes my buggy code ends the running session by over usage of resource. Technically hangs thh PC. But SCRCPY just saved me a large penny. Now I develope apps or android using one my old android phone. But controlling by hand takes time. This software lets me to control my entire device by adb air or wireless adb. Thanks devs... I would love to help you all, so I forked your repo. I hope I'd be able to make some or help to make improvements for this application
summary: The best mirroring software made for all available PC Platforms

I'm also going to use it to share my phone screen on video calls and zoom for teaching. thanks!

I tried the latest version on Debian Sid from the repos, I tried the outdated one in the Ubuntu 20.04 repos, then I tried this Snap version on Ubuntu 20.04. This Snap version gives me the best latency for some reason in Call of Duty Mobile on my Nokia 4.2, noticable faster in 1016x480. Thanks for making it!

Make sure you have enabled developer option and USB debugging mode in mobile, Along with this we need abd tools, install by following steps, it'll work 100% : 

> sudo snap install scrcpy
> sudo apt install abd
> sudo apt-get install android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot
> sudo apt-get install ffmpeg

description: Ich würde mir wünschen das man auch in Ubuntu Android Apps nutzen kann, wie in ChromeOS oder Windows11. Dank diesem kleinen Tool ist es möglich ein Android Gerät nicht nur auf dem PC Bildschirm zu spiegeln, sondern auch komplett mit Maus und Tastatur zu bedienen und die Sitzung aufzuzeichnen. Eine Befehlsübersicht und weitere Infos gibt es auf der Homepage des Tools, einfach dem Link in der Beschreibung bzw. im Terminal folgen. Perfomance ist klasse an USB3, keine Verzögerund mit Samsung Handy.
Die Snap-Version beherrscht leider keine Umlaute und auch kein ß per Tastatur!
Leider nicht brauchbar
Wäre SUPER, wenn es denn auch liefe. Habe Ubuntu. da lässt es sich leider nicht starten.

description: Le logiciel ne demarre pas. Dommage...

Ne fonctionne pas.
il ne ce lance pas sur linux lite
Fonctionne parfaitement
pas de démarrage

Alors il marche très bien et pour le faire marcher il faut aller dans les paramètre du téléphone>A propos du téléphone>information sur le logiciel et appuyer 7x sur le numéro de version (qui active le mode developpeur)Ensuite retourner en arrière dans paramètre et vous y trouverais Options de développement , descendez et vous verrez "Activer le débogage usb" , vous le cochez et vous relancer l'app scrcpy.

Si celui si ne fonctionne pas ou du moins marque "Warning : Server killed" Il faut l'executer avec une commande de redimenssionement de l'écran du style " scrcpy --max-size 800" Il limitera la taille de l'écran.(ha oui et branchez le avant de lancer l'app)

其失败概念小，安装速度快，也同样地好用。
可以将安卓手机投屏到电脑上，在电脑端控制手机

这是一款将安卓手机投射到PC上的应用：安装之后，打开一个新的终端，输入scrcpy回车即可。手机端需要打开USB调试，首次连接可能需要手机端确认一下。
总之，功能很强大，如果你不会用建议去官方开源地址看一下。https://github.com/Genymobile/scrcpy
